method.text: In a shallow bowl, combine soy sauce, pineapple juice, garlic, ginger, sugar and parsley. Mix well.
Add the chicken and toss to coat thoroughly. Cover and leave to marinate in the fridge for 1 days.
Remove the chicken from the marinade. Dice chicken and thread onto skewers, alternating with the red peppers, courgette, and onions.
Place on a grill pan and brush liberally with any remaining marinade. Grill for 10-12 min, turning and basting frequently until cooked.

title: Oriental chicken brochette
